channel.title: Online hosting?
channel.description: ok, my computer would really suck to host a server on, so I am wondering how I would go about buying a server online to host it on, and how that works exactly? If I do that, when I run my server on my computer does the bandwidth go through the online web host I am using or what? If I sound stupid right now, which I am sure I do, please guide me to enlightenment! :D

item.title: Online hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Guhtwables Guhtwables
item.description:
@Guhtwables wrote:

I will run your server for you. Pm me.

Read full topic
